thread.title: Katie Price hits back at critics and claims she STILL has Merry Xmas on the window for autisitic son Harvey
thread.title_full: Katie Price hits back at critics and claims she STILL has Merry Xmas on the window for autisitic son Harvey

author: egritt1
title: Katie Price hits back at critics and claims she STILL has Merry Xmas on the window for autisitic son Harvey
text:
TV Magazine IT'S FOR HARVEY Katie Price hits back at critics and claims she STILL has Merry Xmas on the window for autisitic son Harvey 
Mum-of-five posted angry video on Instagram explaining why she hasn't taken her Christmas decorations down By EMMA GRITT Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments KATIE Price has slammed people for criticising her for still having Merry Christmas spray painted on her windows. A post shared by Katie Price (@officialkatieprice) on Feb 17, 2017 at 12:49pm PST 
With husband Kieran Hayler’s head in the foreground , she raged: “I’d just like to show everyone YES we’ve still got Happy Christmas up on the windows, and everyone is saying ‘ooh why have they got Happy Christmas up?’ 
“Number one because we celebrate Christmas every day – no we don’t really. 
“But number two, every time we go and take it off Harvey goes and gets the hump with it as when you’re autistic you’re used to normal things, and change it affects you. 
She then added sarcastically: “But we will take it down in time. 
“Thank you for listening to my explanation.” News Group Newspapers Ltd 3 Katie Price has revealed she would rather have a son like Harvey than a cruel child 
Her video comes days after she was blasted by fans after they realised she has STILL got ‘Merry Xmas’ spray painted on her windows. 
Hundreds of people criticised the mum-of-five – who has a reported net worth of £40 million – after she posted a picture of her sitting in her living with husband Kieran Hayler and their neighbours on Sunday night. 
But rather than fans see the funny side of all FOUR of them being on their phones simultaneously, they were left aghast at her house still having a sprinkling of festive spirit. Splash News The mum-of-five’s fans think she is more down to earth than ever before 
One commented: “Merry xmas on the window… it’s February.” 
Comments included: “Clean your windows”; “Katie i think your husband needs to clean ur windows”; and “What about the merry xmas on your window it’s nearly March are you saving that for xmas?” 
One fan said she needed curtains as well as a good window cleaner. 
They wrote: “You need some curtains, but first clean your windows.” INSTAGRAM_OfficialKatiePrice Fan were surprised Katie Price still has ‘Merry Xmas’ on the windows and relies on a plug in heater 

Some fans saw the funny side and defended the 38-year-old. 
One joked: “Everyone stop talking about her windows lol.” 
But it wasn’t only the windows that shocked people – the fact that Katie has a plug in heater also raised eyebrows. 
Referring to the small white contraption in the bottom right of the shot, fans observed: “All your money and you use a blow heater quack quack”; “I take it he is cold with the heater next to him, no central heating.” latest in TV and showbiz brit of all right 10 Things You Need to Know about The Brit Awards 2017 ON DEMAND The Natives: America's Forgotten, Billions, Ultimate Beastmaster and Patriot...all at your fingertips this week Ding dong! SPOILER ALERT Wedding bells for Emmerdale's Aaron and Robert...until the police turn up 'He was always joking around' Hollyoaks actress Linda Gray talks about working with Dallas star Larry Hagman 'It's frightening' Sam Riley and Kate Bosworth star in new BBC thriller which sees Nazis win the Battle of Britain FILM GUIDE Testament of Youth, Despicable Me and The Meddler are just some of the films on your TV this week 'THEY MELT MY HEART' Emmerdale fans' joy as Robert Sugden announces he wants to marry Aaron Dingle before he gets sent to prison Downhill disaster Medics rush to help Amy Willerton after horror crash in skeleton bobsled training on The Jump MARVEL-LOUS GOODBYE Hugh Jackman pulls out all the stops to make Logan the bloodiest X Men film yet Freeze-y does it Victoria and David Beckham enjoy family skiing trip as brood put 'Beckileaks' scandal behind them Against All Odds Mariah Carey swapped her engagement ring for a toyboy - here's the lowdown on Bryan Tanaka JUST LIKE ROYALTY Lisa Snowdon bears an uncanny resemblance to Kate Middleton as she arrives at London Fashion Week 
Another said: “It’s about time you washed the happy Xmas off the window! And I’m so sorry but the best bit is the fan heater with all your money a better heating system in your house surely is better lol but thanks as again made me smile at how normal [you are].” Katie Price shows off bloodied lips after having filler injection in Manchester
